name: @YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME/clickup-remote-mcp-server
description: ClickUp Remote MCP Server - CloudFlare Workers SaaS with OAuth 2.0 for AI task management

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:worker && wrangler deploy --env development
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:worker && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:worker && wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.kv:create: npm run kv:create:dev && npm run kv:create:staging && npm run kv:create:prod
scripts.kv:create:dev: wrangler kv namespace create dev_user_sessions && wrangler kv namespace create dev_api_keys && wrangler kv namespace create dev_user_mappings && wrangler kv namespace create dev_rate_limits && wrangler kv namespace create dev_tool_configs && wrangler kv namespace create dev_stripe_customers
scripts.kv:create:staging: wrangler kv namespace create staging_user_sessions --env staging && wrangler kv namespace create staging_api_keys --env staging && wrangler kv namespace create staging_user_mappings --env staging && wrangler kv namespace create staging_rate_limits --env staging && wrangler kv namespace create staging_tool_configs --env staging && wrangler kv namespace create staging_stripe_customers --env staging
scripts.kv:create:prod: wrangler kv namespace create prod_user_sessions --env production && wrangler kv namespace create prod_api_keys --env production && wrangler kv namespace create prod_user_mappings --env production && wrangler kv namespace create prod_rate_limits --env production && wrangler kv namespace create prod_tool_configs --env production && wrangler kv namespace create prod_stripe_customers --env production
scripts.r2:create: wrangler r2 bucket create clickup-mcp-audit-dev && wrangler r2 bucket create clickup-mcp-audit-staging && wrangler r2 bucket create clickup-mcp-audit-prod
scripts.secrets:set: npm run secrets:set:dev && npm run secrets:set:staging && npm run secrets:set:prod
scripts.secrets:set:dev: wrangler secret put CLICKUP_CLIENT_ID --env development && wrangler secret put CLICKUP_CLIENT_SECRET --env development && wrangler secret put ENCRYPTION_KEY --env development && wrangler secret put JWT_SECRET --env development && wrangler secret put STRIPE_SECRET_KEY --env development && wrangler secret put STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET --env development && wrangler secret put STRIPE_PRICE_ID --env development
scripts.secrets:set:staging: wrangler secret put CLICKUP_CLIENT_ID --env staging && wrangler secret put CLICKUP_CLIENT_SECRET --env staging && wrangler secret put ENCRYPTION_KEY --env staging && wrangler secret put JWT_SECRET --env staging && wrangler secret put STRIPE_SECRET_KEY --env staging && wrangler secret put STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET --env staging && wrangler secret put STRIPE_PRICE_ID --env staging
scripts.secrets:set:prod: wrangler secret put CLICKUP_CLIENT_ID --env production && wrangler secret put CLICKUP_CLIENT_SECRET --env production && wrangler secret put ENCRYPTION_KEY --env production && wrangler secret put JWT_SECRET --env production && wrangler secret put STRIPE_SECRET_KEY --env production && wrangler secret put STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET --env production && wrangler secret put STRIPE_PRICE_ID --env production

author: John Freier
